mapper.select: select id as id, userCode as userCode, userPassword as userPassword, userType as userType, flatID as flatID, userName as userName, weChat as weChat, QQ as QQ, weibo as weibo, baidu as baidu, creationDate as creationDate, createdBy as createdBy, modifyDate as modifyDate, modifiedBy as modifiedBy, activated as activated from itrip_user where userCode=#{name} and userPassword=#{ps}

select id as id, userCode as userCode, userPassword as userPassword, userType as userType, flatID as flatID, userName as userName, weChat as weChat, QQ as QQ, weibo as weibo, baidu as baidu, creationDate as creationDate, createdBy as createdBy, modifyDate as modifyDate, modifiedBy as modifiedBy, activated as activated from itrip_user

mapper.insert: insert into itrip_user( userCode, userPassword, userType, flatID, userName, weChat, QQ, weibo, baidu, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy, activated) values( #{userCode}, #{userPassword}, #{userType}, #{flatID}, #{userName}, #{weChat}, #{QQ}, #{weibo}, #{baidu}, #{creationDate}, #{createdBy}, #{modifyDate}, #{modifiedBy}, #{activated})
